title: A state of glory for spirits of just men upon dissolution, demonstrated. A sermon preached in Pauls Church Aug. 30. 1657. before the Rt. Honourable the Lord Mayor and aldermen of the City of London. / By Tho: Goodvvin, D.D. president of Magd. Coll. Oxon.
author: Goodwin, Thomas, 1600-1680.
publisher: Printed by J.G. for Robert Dawlman,
notes: The first leaf bears a "request to print" on verso.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
